title: Tesla Quietly Ends Cheapest Cybertruck: Why You Won’t Miss It

title: Owners Warned: Alfa Romeo Giulia, Stelvio at Risk of Sudden Power Loss

description: The Porsche Taycan Turbo GT has been “banned” from Australian drag strips for exceeding the International Hot Rod Association's 150mph speed limit. description: Ford plans to eliminate up to 1,000 jobs at its Cologne, Germany, plant, reports German news agency DPA. title: U.S. Slashes Tariffs on Japanese Cars to 15% Amid Global Trade Shifts

descriptionSummary: The US has begun reducing tariffs on Japanese autos and components to 15%, effective September 16, marking a significant shift in bilateral trade relations with Japan and potentially redefining the global automotive landscape.

descriptionSummary: Rivian is issuing a recall for nearly 24,000 R1S electric SUVs and R1T pickup trucks due to a software glitch that may compromise the Hands-Free Highway Assist system, particularly when tracking the vehicle's position.

description: Electric vehicle sales grew by 25% worldwide through August 2025, marking one of the strongest adoption years yet. title: EU Accelerates Assessment of 2035 Vehicle Emissions Target
